scripts.sync: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://chai-chat-demo-frontend-site-dev --profile default --delete
scripts.invalidate: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2I1V85BWC0LHU --paths '/*' --profile default > invalidation.log
scripts.deploy: npm run sync && npm run invalidate
scripts.cloudformation:package: aws cloudformation package --template-file cloudfront-template.yaml --s3-bucket chai-chat-demo-frontend-site--dev --output-template-file packaged-cloudfront-template-dev.yaml --profile default
scripts.cloudformation:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-cloudfront-template-dev.yaml --stack-name chai-chat-demo-frontend-stack-dev --profile default --parameter-overrides Environment=dev
scripts.cloudformation:update: npm run cloudformation:package && npm run cloudformation:deploy
